history.proof: intros m z t n. induction n. - left. unfold ex_j. shelve. - destruct IHn. + left. unfold ex_j. simpl. right. auto. + right. unfold ex_j. simpl. intro H. destruct H as [H1 | H2]. * shelve. * apply n0. shelve.

exceptions.exn: In environment m : fmap z, t : dart Unable to unify "t" with "z".
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.
Wrong bullet *: Current bullet * is not finished.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (n : nat), {ex_j m z t n} + {~ ex_j m z t n}

Premises:
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat For S: Argument scope is [nat_scope]
Inductive fmap : Set := V : fmap | I : fmap -> dart -> tag -> point -> fmap | L : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> fmap
ex_j = fix ex_j (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (n : nat) {struct n} : Prop := match n with | 0%nat => z = t | S n0 => Iter (f m) n z = t \/ ex_j m z t n0 end : fmap -> dart -> dart -> nat -> Prop Argument scopes are [_ _ _ nat_scope]
dart = nat : Set
OMEGA7 : forall x y z t : Z, z > 0 -> t > 0 -> 0 <= x -> 0 <= y -> 0 <= x * z + y * t
diff_int_dec : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (a b : nat), {diff_int m z a b} + {~ diff_int m z a b}
diff_int_aux = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) (a b : nat) (t : dart) => forall i : nat, (a <= i <= b)%nat -> Iter (f m) i z <> t : fmap -> dart -> nat -> nat -> dart -> Prop Argument scopes are [_ _ nat_scope nat_scope _]
exds_int_dec : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (a b : nat) (s : set), {exds_int m z a b s} + {~ exds_int m z a b s}
diff_int_aux_dec : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (a b : nat) (t : dart), {diff_int_aux m z a b t} + {~ diff_int_aux m z a b t}
Iter = fix Iter (g : dart -> dart) (n : nat) (z : dart) {struct n} : dart := match n with | 0%nat => z | S n0 => g (Iter g n0 z) end : (dart -> dart) -> nat -> dart -> dart Argument scopes are [function_scope nat_scope _]
exds_int_gt : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (a b : nat) (s : set), (b < a)%nat -> exds_int m z a b s
exd_not_nil : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> z <> nil
fmap_rec : forall P : fmap -> Set, P V -> (forall f0 : fmap, P f0 -> forall (d : dart) (t : tag) (p : point), P (I f0 d t p)) -> (forall f1 : fmap, P f1 -> forall (d : dim) (d0 d1 : dart), P (L f1 d d0 d1)) -> forall f2 : fmap, P f2
fmap_ind : forall P : fmap -> Prop, P V -> (forall f0 : fmap, P f0 -> forall (d : dart) (t : tag) (p : point), P (I f0 d t p)) -> (forall f1 : fmap, P f1 -> forall (d : dim) (d0 d1 : dart), P (L f1 d d0 d1)) -> forall f2 : fmap, P f2
pred_exd : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> pred m k z -> exd m z
succ_exd : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k z -> exd m z
nosucc_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ succ m k z -> top m k z = z
cA_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ succ m k z -> cA m k z = bottom m k z
cA_1_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ pred m k z -> cA_1 m k z = top m k z
not_exd_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ exd m z -> top m k z = nil
not_exd_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ exd m z -> bottom m k z = nil
not_exd_cA : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ exd m z -> cA m k z = nil
not_exd_cA_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ exd m z -> cA_1 m k z = nil
A_1_A : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k z -> A_1 m k (A m k z) = z
top_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ succ m k z -> top m k (bottom m k z) = z
bottom_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ pred m k z -> bottom m k (top m k z) = z
cA_eq : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> cA m k z = (if succ_dec m k z then A m k z else bottom m k z)
cA_1_eq : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> cA_1 m k z = (if pred_dec m k z then A_1 m k z else top m k z)
cA_1_eq_aux : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cA_1 m k z = (if pred_dec m k z then A_1 m k z else top m k z)
cA_eq_aux : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cA m k z = (if succ_dec m k z then A m k z else bottom m k z)
top_bottom_bis : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> top m k (bottom m k z) = top m k z
cA_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cA m k (top m k z) = bottom m k z
bottom_top_bis : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> bottom m k (top m k z) = bottom m k z
Iter_rem_aux_equation : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (sx : set), Iter_rem_aux m z sx = (let n := (ndN m - card sx)%nat in let zn := Iter (f m) n z in if exds_dec sx zn then Iter_rem_aux m z (Ds sx zn) else sx)
top_A : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k z -> top m k (A m k z) = top m k z
exd_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exd m (bottom m k z)
exd_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exd m (top m k z)
succ_exd_A : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k z -> exd m (A m k z)
pred_exd_A_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> pred m k z -> exd m (A_1 m k z)
exd_dec : forall (m : fmap) (x : dart), {exd m x} + {~ exd m x}
Inductive t (A : Type) : nat -> Type := nil : VectorDef.t A 0 | cons : A -> forall n : nat, VectorDef.t A n -> VectorDef.t A (S n) For t: Argument scopes are [type_scope nat_scope] For nil: Argument scope is [type_scope] For cons: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ nat_scope _]
pred_dec : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), {pred m k x} + {~ pred m k x}
succ_dec : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), {succ m k x} + {~ succ m k x}
Compare_dec.le_dec : forall n m : nat, {(n <= m)%nat} + {~ (n <= m)%nat}

``` 
intros m z t n.
induction n.
- left. unfold ex_j. simpl. reflexivity.
- destruct IHn.
  + left. unfold ex_j. simpl. right. assumption.
  + right. unfold ex_j. simpl. intro H. destruct H as [H1 | H2].
    * apply H. 
    * apply n0.
```
